action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_name: Saigon Finest - M Suites Collection by IDG

hotel_text.important_information: This property does not accommodate bachelor(ette) or similar parties. Please inform Saigon Finest - M Suites Collection by IDG of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation.  A damage deposit of VND 5000000 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full, in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 14 days before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel in the 14 days before arrival. If you don’t show up you will be charged the total price of the reservation.

All children are welcome. One child under 3 years stays free of charge when using existing beds.
One child under 3 years stays free of charge in a crib.
There is no capacity for extra beds in the room.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 5.
The maximum number of cribs in a room is 1.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
Private parking is available on site (reservation is needed) and costs  VND 20000 per  hour.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. VND 800,000 Cleaning fee per stay is excluded. VND 5,000,000 Damage deposit per stay is excluded. A City tax is not applicable.
items: VND 800,000 Cleaning fee per stay is excluded.
VND 5,000,000 Damage deposit per stay is excluded.
A City tax is not applicable.
